Projects

This component demonstrates fetching data from the server.

Id Name Type Language Description
{{ project.id }} {{ project.name}} {{ project.type}} {{ project.language}} {{ project.description}}
import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-projects', templateUrl: './projects.component.html', styleUrls: ['./projects.component.css'] }) export class ProjectsComponent { public projects: Project[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'projects').subscribe(result => { this.projects = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } } interface Project { id: string; name: string; type: number; language: number; description: string; }
